synopsis.text: Hazama Shin's mundane life in Japan, 2020, takes an unexpected turn when he encounters an alternate version of himself hailing from a parallel Japan. As a rift unveils in his seemingly unalterable daily existence, Shin and his peers grapple with the profound consequences of a transformed world. The group must now confront the challenges that emerge from this new reality, including a battle against not only another world but also their own doppelg√§ngers. As they navigate this unforeseen predicament, they must determine their stance and make crucial decisions. This original CG anime project, brought to life by studio Craftar and Hulu Japan, invites viewers to embark on a thought-provoking journey filled with action and introspection.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
